    • Method Detail

      • processToken

        public void processToken(java.lang.String token)
        The process token method is from the interface and will scan each token as it comes in, see if it is already a key in the tokenCounts map and add it to the count if it is or add it to the map if it isn't
        Specified by:
        processToken in interface Analyzer
        Parameters:
        token - a String that is a single token from AnalyzeFile

      • writeOutputFile

        public void writeOutputFile(java.lang.String inputFilePath)
        The writeOutputFile method is from the interface and will call the method that will create a file containing all of the keys ands values from the map of tokens and counts
        Specified by:
        writeOutputFile in interface Analyzer
        Parameters:
        inputFilePath - String for the input file path from the command line
